text.div:
Phenotypic Feature Severity

Phenotypic feature severity codes from the Human Phenotype Ontology and SNOMED CT.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/hp.owl where concept descends from HP:0012824
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 272141005

name: PhenotypicFeatureSeverity
title: Phenotypic Feature Severity
publisher: Global Alliance for Genomics and Health
description: Phenotypic feature severity codes from the Human Phenotype Ontology and SNOMED CT.
